gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 108, Grizzlies 101
gameRecap.excerpt: The Cavaliers defeated the Grizzlies, 108-101. Donovan Mitchell recorded 25 points, seven assists, and four rebounds for the Cavaliers, while Caris LeVert added 16 points and three assists in the victory. Jaren Jackson Jr. tallied 25 points, five rebounds, and five assists for the Grizzlies in the defeat. The Cavaliers improve to 30-16, while the Grizzlies fall to 18-30.
